rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the main door in the north-east direction.
Spacious living area with minimalist design. Placed in the south-west to promote energy flow according to Vastu norms.
Dining space integrated within the living room area to maintain open flow and ease of movement.
Modern kitchen designed in north-eastern corner for positive energy and enhanced productivity.
Master bedroom with ample space and natural lighting. Vastu-compliant location promoting restful sleep.
Additional bedroom following minimalist principles for a serene atmosphere.
Guest bedroom designed with simplicity and Vastu alignment in mind.
Bathroom placed near the master bedroom for convenience and aligned with Vastu principles regarding water elements.

openings.description: Provides ample natural light from the east.
Enhances ventilation and views towards the central courtyard.
East-facing window to promote positive energy as per Vastu norms.

rooftop_terrace.description: Spacious rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings. Incorporates minimalist landscaping and seating areas.

swimming_pool.description: A leisure swimming pool integrated within the grounds adhering to Vastu principles by placing water elements in the northeast corner.

central_courtyard.description: A central courtyard that serves as a communal space promoting airflow and light penetration throughout the building.
